title: Guest Requests Room Service Tray Pickup
description: A guest calls to have their used room service tray removed from their room.

tasks.description: Thank the guest and confirm their room number.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent gets the correct room number.

tasks.description: Create a task in the system for a room service attendant to retrieve the tray.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new task is created and dispatched.

tasks.description: Inform the guest that someone will be there shortly.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent sets a clear expectation with the guest.
